name: Clean Minimalism for VK
description:
Минималистичная тема для сайта vk.com.
Основные особенности:
  • Никакой рекламы (все рекламные блоки скрыты);
  • Круглые аватарки;
  • Анимации интерфейса;
  • Clean UI.
additional_info:
Current version: 1.0.3

En description:
Clean minimalistic theme for vk.com website.
Main features
  • No ads (all blocks with ads are hidden);
  • Rounded profile photos (avatars);
  • Additional cool css animations;
  • Clean UI.
Suggestions and bug reports are welcomed in Discussions section.
css:
@-moz-document domain('vk.com') {
	a {
		transition: all 0.5s ease;
	}
	.wall_module a.post_image,
	.wide_wall_module a.reply_image,
	.wide_wall_module img.reply_image,
	.chat_tab_img,
	.wall_module a.published_by_photo,
	.wall_module a.reply_image,
	a.fc_msgs_author,
	.ava img,
	.page_list_module .thumb img,
	.friends_bigph_wrap,
	.pv_thumb img,
	#pv_author_img,
	.mv_author_img,
	.mv_thumb img,
	.audio_friend_photo,
	.dialogs_photo img,
	.dialogs_msg_body .dialogs_inline_author,
	div.im_log_author_chat_thumb,
	img.im_user_holder,
	.im_photo_holder,
	.group_row_photo,
	img.fc_contact_photo,
	#search_content .three_col_row .img {
	    border-radius: 50%;
	    overflow: hidden;
		transition: all 0.5s ease;
	}
	.wall_module a.post_image:hover,
	.wide_wall_module a.reply_image:hover,
	.wide_wall_module img.reply_image:hover,
	.chat_tab_img:hover,
	.wall_module a.published_by_photo:hover,
	.wall_module a.reply_image:hover,
	a.fc_msgs_author:hover,
	.ava img:hover,
	.page_list_module .thumb img:hover,
	.friends_bigph_wrap:hover,
	.pv_thumb img:hover,
	#pv_author_img:hover,
	.mv_author_img:hover,
	.mv_thumb img:hover,
	.audio_friend_photo:hover,
	.dialogs_photo img:hover,
	.dialogs_msg_body .dialogs_inline_author:hover,
	div.im_log_author_chat_thumb:hover,
	img.im_user_holder:hover,
	.im_photo_holder:hover,
	.group_row_photo:hover,
	img.fc_contact_photo:hover,
	#search_content .three_col_row .img:hover {
		transform: scale(1.1);
	}
	.friends_bigph_wrap .friends_bigph,
	.post[data-ad],
	.ads_ads_news_wrap,
	#feed_recommends,
	#left_ads,
	#ads_left,
	.ads_ads_box {
		display: none !important;
	}
	.chat_tab_close {
		z-index: 10;
	}
}
